name: FUWRY
description:
FUWRY adalah game 3D space shooter yang berlatar di luar angkasa. Gameplay dari game ini endless yang dimana player mencari score setinggi mungkin.   

Controll : 

WASD / Arrow Key - Move

Space - Shoot

F - Shoot Power Up

Credits 

Team C4 :

Gandhi Hartoko - Game Design

Kelvin Utomo - Programmer

Melvin Osvaldo - 3D Artist

Reference Game  : 

Game - Zaxxon (1982)

Game Assets : 

UI - https://craftpix.net/freebies/free-space-shooter-game-gui/

Music / Effect Sound - https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/space-shooter/  

                                                  https://pixabay.com/music/search/space/

Background Game - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/spaceskies-free-...
